metadata.title: CVE-2025-0509 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A security issue was found in Sparkle before version 2.64. An attacker canreplace an existing signed update with another payload, bypassing Sparkleâ€™s(Ed)DSA signing checks.

criterions.comment: openjdk-8 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
openjdk-9: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'no longer supported by upstream').
